name: Abraxas
description: Arkarzar Abraxas, Infernal Master, is a character of the Thousand Sons faction.
traits: Daemon, Flying, Summon, Weaver of Fates

activeAbility.name: Malefic Maelstrom
activeAbility.description:
Malefic Maelstrom
Summon a Pink Horror on a free Hex adjacent to Abraxas. Until the end of this turn, whenever an enemy unit is dealt Psychic Damage, summon a Screamer of Tzeentch on a free Hex adjacent to Abraxas, preferring hexes adjacent to enemy units. Newly summoned units can immediately attack an enemy in range but cannot move.
Split (Pink Horror Passive)
When this unit gets defeated it summons 2 Blue Horrors in adjacent Hexes. Does not apply if Overkilled. Newly summoned Blue Horrors can immediately attack an enemy in melee if summoned during the enemy's turn, but cannot move until their next turn.
Slashing Dive (Screamer Active)
Flies over and deals a wave of damage from an initial melee target to targets up to 2 hexes behind. Deals 1x X Power Damage to the first target, 1x Y Power Damage to the second, and 1x Z Power Damage to the third. Lands in the hex directly behind the last target hit, or - in the case that hex is occupied - to the closest free hex to it.

passiveAbility.name: Infernal Pacts
passiveAbility.description:
Infernal Pacts
Friendly Chaos units adjacent to Abraxas deal an additional 1x X Psychic Damage with their normal ranged attacks. Affected Daemons also gain the bonus Hit on their normal melee attack.

Defend the Divine Work
Repairs himself and all friendly adjacent units X Health.
Note: Repair only affects Mechanical units.

Galvanic Field
Whenever Actus repairs another unit, that unit immediately attacks a target in range, dealing X% of its own Damage to a maximum of Y Damage per hit. Actus can repair other friendly units even if they are at full Health.
Note: Repair only affects Mechanical units.

name: Ahriman
description: Ahzek Ahriman, Architect of the Rubric, is a character of the Thousand Sons faction.

activeAbility.name: Doombolt
activeAbility.description:
Deals 3x X Psychic Damage, evenly distributing the hits between all enemies within 2 hexes. Adds +1 Hit for each hex on the battlefield that is currently on Fire. Cannot exceed 9 Hits.
When Ahriman defeats an enemy with his normal ranged attack and Doombolt has already been used, then Doombolt can be used again in this battle.
Note: Doombolt will recharge each time the condition is met.

passiveAbility.name: Psychic Stalk
passiveAbility.description:
Psychic Stalk
Attacks that deal Flame Damage and Psychic Damage to enemies that are on hexes with Fire deal +X% Damage. Affected attacks from friendly Chaos units deal an additional +Y Damage.
The hex of each enemy that is hit by Ahriman's normal ranged attack catches Fire.
Note: The bonus applies per hit and the Chaos unit bonus is added before the percent bonus is calculated.

name: Aleph-Null
description: Canoptek Spyder Aleph-Null is a character of the Necrons faction.
traits: Flying, Living Metal, Mechanical, Summon, Swarm

activeAbility.name: Scarab Hive
activeAbility.description:
Scarab Hive
Summons 2 Scarab Swarms next to the target, whom they immediately attack using the Damage type Piercing. In any subsequent attack they use their normal Damage type.
Scarab Summon (Active)
Summons another Scarab Swarm in a free adjacent hex, which then immediately takes a turn.
Reanimation Protocols (Passive)
If there is at least one other friendly unit of the same type on the battlefield when this unit is defeated, it has a 35% chance to be immediately revived with 25% of its initial Health in the same hex or a random adjacent one. Does not apply if Overkilled.

passiveAbility.name: Fabricator Claw Array
passiveAbility.description:
Fabricator Claw Array
After moving, repairs one random adjacent friendly Mechanical unit for X Health. If Aleph-Null does not move, then this ability triggers at the end of its turn.
Note: Can restore lost members to damaged Scarab Swarms.

name: Aun'Shi
description: Ethereal Aun'Shi is a character of the Tau Empire faction.

activeAbility.name: Inspired to Greatness
activeAbility.description:
Inspired to Greatness
Enables a friendly unit in an adjacent Tile to use their Active Ability again in this battle and heals or repairs it for X Health. For this second use, the Ability is at the lowest of its own level and that of Inspired to Greatness. If that unit has not used their active Ability yet, then Y Health is restored instead.
(How Does Inspired to Greatness Work?)

passiveAbility.name: Serene Unifier
passiveAbility.description:
Serene Unifier
Aun'Shi grants himself, and adjacent friendly units a bonus based on the current round at the beginning of his turn. Friendly Tau Empire units within 2 Hexes also receive this bonus. The bonus lasts until the start of the unit's next turn, even if Aun'Shi is defeated. The following Buffs are granted subsequently in each round.
After round 3, the cycle begins again and will continue to repeat until Aun'Shi is defeated.

name: Boss Gulgortz
description: Boss Gulgortz Bulldoza, Warboss in Mega Armour, is a character of the Orks faction.

activeAbility.name: WAAAGH!
activeAbility.description:
If Boss Gulgortz has not moved, he summons 2 Ork Boyz in free adjacent hexes. Until the end of this turn, all friendly Orks and friendly units adjacent to Boss Gulgortz gain +1 Movement and their normal melee attacks deal +X Damage and score +1 Hit. Boss Gulgortz then charges a targeted enemy in movement range, performing a normal melee attack against it. All friendly Ork Boyz take a turn.
Note: Using this ability requires a target within range to charge.
Stikkbomb (Active)
Throws a grenade at a target, dealing 2x X Blast Damage to the target and 1x X Blast Damage to units in hexes adjacent to the target. Range 2 and Indirect Fire applies.

passiveAbility.name: Light 'Im Up
passiveAbility.description:
Light 'Im Up
After performing a Normal Attack, Boss Gulgortz performs a second attack against the same enemy, dealing 3x X Projectile Damage. If the target is defeated, leftover hits are allocated to any random enemy target within 3 hexes.

If Celestine is in an adjacent hex and takes damage, that post-Armour damage is taken as Direct Damage by the Geminae Superia instead.

traits: Deep Strike, Final Vengeance, Flying, Rapid Assault, Terrifying

activeAbility.name: Light of Sanguinius

Light of Sanguinius
If Dante has not moved, he gains Infiltrate until the end of this turn, then charges an enemy target that has a free adjacent hex within movement range 5 and deals 5x X Melta Damage to it. passiveAbility.description:
Lord of the Host
Other friendly units within 2 hexes with Rapid Assault or Flying deal +X Damage with melee attacks. Affected units that are at or below 50% Health also score +1 hit with melee attacks.

description: Shas'el T'au Myamoto, aka Sub-Commander Darkstrider, is a character of the Tau Empire faction.
traits: Close Combat Weakness, Infiltrate, Suppressive Fire

activeAbility.name: Fighting Retreat
activeAbility.description:
Fighting Retreat
Adjacent enemies gain a Markerlight. They also have 1 fewer Hits, to a minimum of one, and deal -X Damage for one round. Darkstrider and adjacent allied units ignore their Close Combat Weakness trait for ranged attacks until the end of this turn.
If Darkstrider is adjacent to an enemy, he can immediately take another turn after using this ability.

passiveAbility.name: Structural Analyser
passiveAbility.description:
Structural Analyser
Units hit by ranged attacks from Darkstrider receive a Markerlight for one round.
Friendly units adjacent to Darkstrider deal +X Damage with ranged attacks against targets with a Markerlight. Friendly Tau Empire units within 2 hexes of Darkstrider are also affected.

description: Deathleaper, the Vanguard Organism, is a character of the Tyranids faction.

activeAbility.name: Fear of the Unseen
activeAbility.description:
Fear of the Unseen
If the Deathleaper has not moved this turn and is not in Deep Strike, all enemies within 2 hexes get Suppressed and trigger Battle Fatigue, if they have it. The Deathleaper vanishes and cannot be targeted or damaged for 1 round. In its next turn, its attacks deal an additional 3x X Direct Damage and it can move to any free hex on the battlefield that is either within Synapse range, has Tall Grass or is not adjacent to an enemy.

passiveAbility.name: Feeder Tendrils
passiveAbility.description:
Feeder Tendrils
When charging, the Deathleaper deals +X Damage, heals for Y Health, and Suppresses the target for 1 round.

Ramshackle (Passive)
Takes -X Damage from attacks with Damage Types that have 30% Pierce Ratio or lower.

passiveAbility.description:
Kustom Force Field

activeAbility.name: Herald of the Apocalypse
activeAbility.description:
Herald of the Apocalypse
Deals 2x X Piercing Damage to an adjacent enemy and an additional enemy directly behind the target. Affected enemies receive +Y Damage from the next attack against them. Also triggers Battle Fatigue for all enemy units within 2 hexes of the original target.

passiveAbility.name: Head-Claimer
passiveAbility.description:
Head-Claimer
For each enemy unit that Haarken has defeated, his attacks deal +X Damage for the rest of the battle.
For each enemy Character that he has defeated, his attacks also score +1 Hit for the rest of the battle.

passiveAbility.name: Destroy The Witch
passiveAbility.description:
Destroy The Witch

name: Hollan
description: Hollan Baumgart, Biophagus, is a character of the Genestealer Cults faction.

activeAbility.name: Aberrant Hypermorph
activeAbility.description:
Aberrant Hypermorph
Summons an Aberrant Hypermorph in a free adjacent hex. The Aberrant Hypermorph can immediately attack, but cannot move this turn.
Hypermorph (Passive)
Gain extra Damage equal to 15% of current Health.

passiveAbility.name: Twisted Science
passiveAbility.description:
Twisted Science
Units Healed by Hollan, other than himself, are affected by Twisted Science until they are defeated. Hollan can heal other unaffected units even if they are at full Health. Affected units immediately gain X Health and their maximum Health increases by the same amount. If they are a Genestealer Cults unit, they also deal +Y Damage while affected. Affected units cannot gain the effects of Twisted Science again.

description: Hexmark Destroyer Imospekh is a character of the Necrons faction.

activeAbility.name: Multi-Threat Eliminator
activeAbility.description:
Multi-Threat Eliminator
Deals 6x X Molecular Damage to an enemy within range 2. Any leftover hits are allocated to another enemy adjacent to the target and in range 2. Each enemy killed adds +1 hit and the ability keeps targeting new enemies until there are no more enemies or hits left.

passiveAbility.name: Inescapable Death
passiveAbility.description:
Inescapable Death
Imospekh's ranged attacks each deal +X damage per hit when triggered by Overwatch. When defeating a unit with an attack triggered by Overwatch, Imospekh stays in Overwatch, retaining 1 fewer hits compared to the previous attack.

description: Isaak Starn, Primus, is a character of the Genestealer Cults faction.

activeAbility.name: Cult Demagogue
activeAbility.description:
Cult Demagogue
Targets an enemy unit within 2 hexes and places Decoys on up to Y random free hexes within 2 hexes around the target. Then summons Neophyte Hybrids on half of all the friendly Decoys in that area and all Neophyte Hybrids in that area immediately take a turn.

passiveAbility.name: Decoys and Misdirection
passiveAbility.description:
Decoys and Misdirection
When an enemy moves onto a friendly Decoy, it takes 1x X Blast Damage. When a friendly unit resurrects onto or moves onto a friendly Decoy, it deals +Y Damage until the end of its turn, and if it is a Genestealer Cults unit, it also places a new Decoy in a free adjacent hex.

Resurrected units appear in free adjacent hexes with Y Health and are unable to act on this turn. Only affects non-Mechanical units.

passiveAbility.description:

Note: Medicus Ministorum triggers once per attack, not per hit.

name: Judh
description: Judh Lhaska, Kelermorph, is a character of the Genestealer Cults faction.

activeAbility.name: Heroic Fusillade
activeAbility.description:
Heroic Fusillade
Targets an enemy unit that has a free surrounding hex within movement range 2 of Judh or is already on a hex surrounding Judh. She then moves to the free hex and deals 6x X Projectile Damage to the target and all other enemies surrounding it. Crits deal an additional +Y Crit Damage for each free hex surrounding the targeted enemy.
When Judh is resurrected and Heroic Fusillade has already been used, then it can be used again in this battle.

passiveAbility.name: Hypersensory Abilities
passiveAbility.description:
Hypersensory Abilities
The first time each enemy turn that Judh is attacked, she cannot fall below X% of her current Health. After the attack, she moves to a free adjacent hex and places a Decoy on the hex she moved from. Then, if she is within 2 hexes of the unit that attacked her, she deals 3x Y Projectile Damage to that unit.

traits: Beast Slayer, Martial Ka'tah, Parry, Rapid Assault, Resilient

activeAbility.name: Martial Inspiration
activeAbility.description:
Martial Inspiration
Deals 3x X Eviscerating Damage to an adjacent enemy. This attack and attacks from Legacy of Combat this turn deal +Y% Damage for each turn in which Kariyan performed an attack this battle. This ability can be used multiple times per battle but has a cooldown of 2 rounds.

passiveAbility.name: Legacy of Combat
passiveAbility.description:
Legacy of Combat
After performing his first attack each turn, Kariyan performs an additional attack. If he is adjacent to an enemy Big Target, this attack deals 1x X Piercing Damage to it. If there is no adjacent enemy Big Target, Kariyan deals 3x Y Power Damage to each adjacent enemy instead.

name: Kharn
description: Khrn, the Betrayer, Champion of Khorne, is a character of the World Eaters faction.
traits: Blessings of Khorne, Final Vengeance, Rapid Assault

activeAbility.name: Kill! Maim! Burn!
activeAbility.description:
Kill! Maim! Burn!
Deals 1x X Piercing Damage to an adjacent enemy. Then performs a second attack targeting an adjacent enemy, dealing 6x Y Eviscerating Damage. Then performs a third attack targeting an enemy within range 2, dealing 1x Z Plasma Damage. All attacks prioritize the same target until it is killed and then prioritize kills.

passiveAbility.name: The Betrayer
passiveAbility.description:
The Betrayer
After performing a normal attack, Khrn performs a second attack targeting an adjacent enemy, dealing 4x X Eviscerating Damage.
If Khrn has defeated an enemy this battle, at the start of his turn, he automatically moves up to 2 hexes towards the nearest unit and then deals 4x X Eviscerating Damage to an adjacent unit. Khrn prefers enemies for this automatic move and attack, but targets friendly units if no enemy is in range.

Visions of Heresy

name: Lucius
description: Lucius the Eternal, Champion of Slaanesh, is a character of the Emperor's Children faction.

activeAbility.name: Lash of Torment
activeAbility.description:
Lash of Torment
Deals 6x X Eviscerating Damage to an enemy unit within range 2. If the target is not already adjacent to Lucius, it is then pulled 1 hex towards him if possible, and can be pulled over any elevation but not through impassable terrain. If the target is adjacent to Lucius after the attack, it is also Taunted by him for 1 round(s).

passiveAbility.name: Armour of Shrieking Souls
passiveAbility.description:
Armour of Shrieking Souls
If Lucius is defeated by an enemy unit, that enemy becomes Elated. At the beginning of each of its turns, the affected unit loses X Health and when it is defeated, Lucius resurrects on the hex it was defeated on with Y Health.
Note: Healing/Repairing does not remove Elated. The health loss cannot be increased or reduced by any modifiers.

name: Marshal Dreir
description: Lord Marshal Varnan Dreir is a character of the Astra Militarum faction.

activeAbility.name: Leading the Charge
activeAbility.description:
Leading the Charge
If Dreir has not moved, he gains Infiltrate until the end of this turn and charges an enemy target that has a free adjacent hex within movement range 4, dealing 3x X Power Damage to it. Then, summon up to Y Death Riders in free adjacent hexes that can immediately attack enemies in range. All attacks triggered by this ability have +Z% Pierce Ratio for each friendly unit that has been defeated this battle.
Frag Lance (Passive)
When Charging, normal melee attacks deal an additional 1x X Blast Damage.

passiveAbility.name: Tough to Kill
passiveAbility.description:
Tough to Kill
At the beginning of his turn, Dreir regenerates X Health. All attacks against Dreir have -Y% Crit Chance and deal -Z Crit Damage.

name: Mataneo
description: Mataneo, Jump Pack Intercessor Sergeant, is a character of the Blood Angels faction.

activeAbility.name: Hammer of Wrath
activeAbility.description:
Hammer of Wrath
If Mataneo has not moved, he gains Infiltrate until the end of this turn, charges an enemy target that has a free adjacent hex within movement range 5, dealing 2x X Power Damage to the target and 1x X Physical Damage to all enemies adjacent to it. If Mataneo is at or below 50% Health, double the damage dealt by this ability.
This ability's Damage ignores all of the attacker bonuses and modifiers (including elevation), and cannot Crit.
Note: The damage doubling is pre-Armour.

passiveAbility.name: Aggressive Onslaught
passiveAbility.description:
Aggressive Onslaught
When charging, Mataneo summons 2 Jump Pack Intercessors adjacent to and immediately attacking his target. At the beginning of each of Mataneo's turns, if he is still on the battlefield, all Jump Pack Intercessors summoned this way leave the battlefield.
Red Thirst (Passive)
If this unit is at or below 50% Health, it gains +X Damage and scores +1 hit when charging.

name: Maugan Ra
description: Maugan Ra, Dark Reaper Phoenix Lord, is a character of the Aeldari faction.

activeAbility.name: Harvester of Souls
activeAbility.description:
Harvester of Souls
Deals 2x X Heavy Round Damage to a target within range 3 and to all enemies adjacent to the target that are also within range 3 of Maugan Ra. These attacks score an additional hit if Maugan Ra has not moved this turn.

passiveAbility.name: Inescapable Accuracy
passiveAbility.description:
Inescapable Accuracy
If Maugan Ra has not moved then his ranged attacks ignore hit reductions from both hex effects and unit effects, and they also have +X% Crit Chance and deal an additional Y Crit Damage. Inescapable Accuracy applies to targets of Maugetar as well as attacks triggered by Overwatch.

name: Mephiston
description: Mephiston, Lord of Death, is a character of the Blood Angels faction.

activeAbility.name: The Quickening
activeAbility.description:
The Quickening
Targets a hex within movement range 2 that is neither occupied by an enemy nor by a friendly unit in Deep Strike. Mephiston moves onto that hex. If a friendly unit is on that hex, that unit moves to Mephiston's previous location. All Blood Angels moving this way perform a normal melee attack after they move, dealing X% of their of their own damage to a maximum of Y Damage. Units moving this way do not trigger Overwatch or other movement related reactions.
(How does The Quickening work?)

passiveAbility.name: Fury of the Ancients
passiveAbility.description:
Fury of the Ancients
After moving, deals 2x X Psychic Damage to an adjacent enemy and an additional enemy adjacent to the initial one. For 2 rounds, affected units cannot be revived, healed, repaired, nor otherwise restore Health. If Mephiston does not move, this ability triggers at the end of his turn.
(Note: Death replacement effects like Incisus's or Nauseous Rotbone's Passives are Revives. Effects like Isabella's active are Resurrections.)

name: Morvenn Vahl
description: Morvenn Vahl is a character of the Adepta Sororitas faction.
traits: Act of Faith, Big Target, Explodes, Mechanical

activeAbility.name: Sanctorum Missile
activeAbility.description:
Sanctorum Missile
Deals 2x X Blast Damage to a target within 3 hexes and 1x X Blast Damage to all hexes adjacent to the target - with the exception of Morvenn Vahl's own hex, were she adjacent to the target. Range 3.
Note: This ability functions as "within range 3", so cannot target units at range if an enemy is adjacent.

passiveAbility.name: Righteous Repugnance
passiveAbility.description:
Righteous Repugnance
Normal melee attacks deal an additional 3x X Power Damage to the target and to all enemy units adjacent to both the target and to Morvenn Vahl. When Morvenn Vahl defeats a unit with a melee attack, it has a Y% chance to count twice for Act of Faith.

name: Neurothrope
description: Neurothrope, the Psychic Organism, is a character of the Tyranids faction.
traits: Close Combat Weakness, Flying, Psyker, Shadow in the Warp, Synapse

activeAbility.name: Spirit Leech
activeAbility.description:
Spirit Leech
Deal 1x X Psychic Damage to an enemy unit within 3 Hexes. If the target is Suppressed, deals an additional +Y Damage, otherwise Suppresses it. The Neurothrope heals itself and friendly Tyranids adjacent to it for Health equal to Z% of the total damage dealt with this ability.
This ability's Damage ignores all of the attacker bonuses and modifiers (including elevation), and cannot Crit.
Note: Even though this ability ignores attacker bonuses, it does benefit from stacks of Neuroparasite.

passiveAbility.name: Neuroparasite
passiveAbility.description:
Neuroparasite
Each enemy that is dealt Psychic Damage by the Neurothrope is infected by a Neuroparasite until either the unit is healed or the Neurothrope is defeated. Whenever a unit infected with a Neuroparasite takes Psychic Damage or becomes affected by an attack or ability that would Suppress it, the level of the Neuroparasite increases by 1, up to a maximum of X.
Psychic Damage dealt by the Neurothrope is increased by Y Damage for each level of a Neuroparasite on the target.

name: Njal
description: Njal Stormcaller, Lord of Runes, is a character of the Space Wolves faction.

activeAbility.name: Stormcaller
activeAbility.description:
Stormcaller
Target an enemy within 3 hexes. The target's hex and all adjacent hexes get covered in Ice. All enemy units standing on hexes covered in Ice take 3x X Psychic Damage. Flying enemies damaged this way get Stunned for 1 round.
This ability's Damage ignores all of the attacker bonuses and modifiers (including elevation), and cannot Crit.

passiveAbility.name: Lord of Tempests
passiveAbility.description:
Lord of Tempests
Njal's normal attacks deal +X Damage for each hex surrounding him that is covered in Ice. The hex of each enemy that is hit by Njal's normal attacks is covered in Ice at the end of the attack.

name: Parasite of Mortrex
description: Parasite of Mortrex, the Invader Organism, is a character of the Tyranids faction.
traits: Battle Fatigue, Instinctive Behaviour, Summon, Swarm

activeAbility.name: It Itches!
activeAbility.description:
Suppresses and pushes an adjacent enemy unit and all enemy units adjacent to both the target and the Parasite of Mortrex one hex backwards. Enemy steppables on affected hexes are destroyed. Then summons a Ripper Swarm in each hex vacated by this ability. The Ripper Swarms can immediately attack. If the Parasite of Mortrex is within Synapse range, it may move again after activating this ability.
Burrowers (Active)
This unit may burrow in its turn, disappearing from the battlefield. In its following turn it must surface and may do so in any free hex. If adjacent to an enemy unit, it may attack in melee immediately.

passiveAbility.name: Barbed Ovipositor
passiveAbility.description:
Barbed Ovipositor
When the Parasite of Mortrex defeats a unit it targeted that is not Mechanical it summons a Ripper Swarm in the defeated unit's hex.

traits: Contagions of Nurgle, Putrid Explosion, Resilient

activeAbility.name: Foul Infusion
activeAbility.description:
Foul Infusion
Pestillian and all friendly Chaos units within his Contagion aura deal an extra 1x X Toxic Damage with their normal melee attacks for this round and the next. Pestillian then immediately performs a normal melee attack against a random adjacent enemy.

passiveAbility.name: Explosive Maladies
passiveAbility.description:
Explosive Maladies
Friendly units adjacent to Pestillian deal an additional 1x X Blast Damage with their normal ranged attacks. Friendly Chaos units adjacent to Pestillian also deal this damage with normal melee attacks. Enemies defeated by affected attacks are always Overkilled.

name: Ragnar
description: Ragnar Blackmane, Wolf Lord of the Blackmanes, is a character of the Space Wolves faction.
traits: Beast Slayer, Final Vengeance, Rapid Assault

activeAbility.name: War Howl
activeAbility.description:
If Ragnar has not moved, he and all friendly Characters that don't have a normal ranged attack gain Unstoppable until the end of this turn. Additionally, their normal melee attacks have +X% Crit Chance and deal +Y Damage until the end of this turn.
After using War Howl, Ragnar can move and perform a normal attack.

passiveAbility.name: Saga of the Warrior Born
passiveAbility.description:
Saga of the Warrior Born
When charging, Ragnar scores X additional Hits and his critical hits deal an additional +Y Crit Damage.
If Ragnar has defeated one or more enemy Characters this battle, friendly Space Wolves also gain this ability.
Note: Friendly Space Wolves only gain the first part of the ability (the additional Hits and Crit Damage). They do not gain the second part of the ability to give the ability to friendly Space Wolves again.

name: Re'vas
description: Shas'vre Vior'la Re'vas is a character of the Tau Empire faction.

activeAbility.name: Early Warning Override
activeAbility.description:
Early Warning Override
Summons 2 Shield Drones into free adjacent hexes. Newly summoned Shield Drones can immediately attack an enemy in melee, but cannot move this turn.
Re'vas also starts Overwatching until the start of her next turn, ignoring the Close Combat Weakness trait and dealing +X Damage. When defeating a unit while Overwatching, she remains in Overwatch, retaining 1 fewer Hits compared to the previous attack.
Savior Protocols (Passive)
If a friendly adjacent Tau Empire Character is hit by an attack, there is a 50% chance that this Drone takes the hit instead.
When moving, this Drone tries to prioritize hexes adjacent to friendly Tau Empire Characters, especially the character who summomned it.
When attacking, this Drone tries to prioritize enemies with a Markerlight.

passiveAbility.name: Cyclic Ion Blaster
passiveAbility.description:
Cyclic Ion Blaster
All attacks deal an additional 3x X Particle Damage.
If the target has a Markerlight or the Mechanical trait these hits deal +Y Damage.

name: Sarquael
description: Hellblaster Sergeant Sarquael is a character of the Dark Angels faction.

activeAbility.name: Supercharge
activeAbility.description:
Supercharge
Deals 1x X Plasma Damage to a target enemy within range 3 and 1x Y Plasma Damage to up to two enemies in adjacent hexes behind the target, all with +Z% pierce ratio. Until the beginning of Sarquael's next turn, any further hits that deal Plasma Damage against these units also have +Z% pierce ratio.
Note: +35% Pierce Ratio comes at level 50

passiveAbility.name: Grim Retribution
passiveAbility.description:
Grim Retribution
During each enemy turn, if there is no enemy adjacent to Sarquael, he shoots back at the first enemy within range that attacked him or a friendly adjacent Dark Angel. This shot counts as Overwatch and deals 1x X Plasma Damage.

name: Shadowsun
description: Shas'O T'au Shaserra, aka Shadowsun, aka Supreme Commander of the T'au Empire, is a character of the Tau Empire faction.

activeAbility.name: Exemplar of the Kauyon
activeAbility.description:
Exemplar of the Kauyon
Commander Shadowsun disappears, then reappears on a target Hex adjacent to an allied unit and immediately performs a normal attack against the closest enemy target. This attack deals an additional 2x X Blast Damage. A stationary Command-Link Drone is summoned in the hex she previously occupied.
Initial cooldown: 1 round
Savior Protocols (Passive)
If a friendly adjacent Tau Empire Character is hit by an attack, there is a 50% chance that this Drone takes the hit instead.
When moving, this Drone tries to prioritize hexes adjacent to friendly Tau Empire Characters, especially the character who summomned it.
When attacking, this Drone tries to prioritize enemies with a Markerlight.

passiveAbility.name: Defender of the Greater Good
passiveAbility.description:
Defender of the Greater Good
Friendly units adjacent to Shadowsun or her Command-Link Drone deal +X Damage with ranged attacks, except attacks that deal Psychic Damage. Affected attacks also have a chance to score an additional hit. This chance is 25% for each round in which Shadowsun has been on the battlefield. Friendly Tau Empire units within 2 hexes of Shadowsun or her Command-Link Drone are also affected by this ability.

name: Sho'syl
description: Shas'ui Vior'la Sho'syl is a character of the Tau Empire faction.
traits: Close Combat Weakness, Flying, Mechanical, Summon

activeAbility.name: Seeker Missile Frequency Lock
activeAbility.description:
Seeker Missile Frequency Lock
A target enemy unit within 5 hexes receives a Markerlight until the end of Sho'syl's next turn. At the beginning of Sho'syl's next turn, if he is still in play, the target is hit by a Seeker Missile dealing 1x X Heavy Round Damage.
This ability's Damage ignores all of the attacker bonuses and modifiers (including elevation), and cannot Crit.

passiveAbility.name: MV71 Sniper Drone Squad
passiveAbility.description:
MV71 Sniper Drone Squad
Instead of a ranged attack, Sho'syl summons a MV71 Sniper Drone and commands it to attack the target. This attack uses Sho'syl's Damage stat, while other effects, like buffs, are taken from the Drone. If Sho'syl already controls 3 MV71 Sniper Drones, the one with the lowest Health is removed before the new Drone is summoned.
The target also gains a Markerlight until the end of Sho'syl's next turn.
Savior Protocols (Passive)
If a friendly adjacent Tau Empire Character is hit by an attack, there is a 50% chance that this Drone takes the hit instead.
When moving, this Drone tries to prioritize hexes adjacent to friendly Tau Empire Characters, especially the character who summomned it.
When attacking, this Drone tries to prioritize enemies with a Markerlight.

description: Grumbal Snotflogga, Runtherder is a character of the Orks faction.

activeAbility.name: Get'em Runtz
activeAbility.description:
Get'em Runtz
Summons 1 Grot in each adjacent hex that also has an enemy unit adjacent to it. Newly spawned Grots can immediately attack an enemy in melee, but cannot move this turn. Enemy units attacked by a Grot this way are Taunted for 1 round.
Pile In (Passive)
If this unit has full Health at the end of its turn, it has a 75% chance to spawn another Grot in an adjacent free hex, -5% for each friendly Grot currently on the board. The spawned Grot acts as normal on its next turn.

passiveAbility.name: Squig Hound
passiveAbility.description:
Squig Hound
Friendly Grots ignore Battle Fatigue. Each time Snotflogga attacks, the Squig Hound also bites the target, dealing an additional 2x X Physical Damage. Then, if there are less than 5 friendly Grots on the battlefield, summon a Grot adjacent to the target that immediately can attack.

name: Tan Gi'da
description: Tan Gi'da, Skitarii Marshal, is a character of the Adeptus Mechanicus faction.

activeAbility.name: Doctrina Imperatives
activeAbility.description:
Doctrina Imperatives
Tan Gi'da switches between two Imperatives that affect him and all friendly adjacent Mechanical units:
This ability can be used once per turn instead of once per battle; each use switches the active Imperative. Tan Gi'da can attack after using this ability. Only the first use of this ability each battle counts for missions.

passiveAbility.name: Control Edict
passiveAbility.description:
Control Edict
While Protector Imperative is active: After Tan Gi'da attacks, summon a Skitarii Vanguard in a free adjacent hex. Cannot have more than X Skitarii Vanguards summoned this way at the same time.
While Conqueror Imperative is active: After Tan Gi'da attacks, all friendly adjacent Mechanical Summons also immediately attack his target if it is within range.
Rad-Saturation (Passive)
After the Skitarii Vanguard moves, it adds Contamination to its hex. If it does not move, then this ability triggers at the end of its turn.

name: Tanksmasha
description: Olog Tanksmasha, Nob on a Smasha Squig, is a character of the Orks faction.
traits: Beast Slayer, Get Stuck In, Unstoppable

activeAbility.name: Unstoppable Momentum
activeAbility.description:
Unstoppable Momentum
Charges in one of 6 directions and keeps moving in a straight line until he hits an obstacle or a Big Target. Any enemies hit by the charge take 1x X Direct Damage, increased by Y Damage for each hex traversed from the starting hex to the enemy. Affected enemies get pushed and Suppressed for 1 round. A Big Target is Stunned for 1 round instead. Friendly units are also displaced, but take no damage or negative effects.
Initial cooldown: 1 round
(How Does Tanksmasha Work?)

passiveAbility.name: Smasha 'Ead
passiveAbility.description:
Smasha 'Ead
When he traverses 2 or more hexes during his turn, then Tanksmasha gains +X Damage for normal attacks and takes -Y% Damage until the start of his next turn.

name: Thaddeus Noble
description: Thaddeus 'Stevens' Noble is a character of the Astra Militarum faction.

activeAbility.name: Basilisk Barrage
activeAbility.description:
Basilisk Barrage
If Thaddeus Noble has not moved, unleashes a barrage of 5 shells on any target on the battlefield, each dealing 2x X Blast Damage. 3 randomly hit the target hex or surrounding hexes and the remaining 2 hit the hexes surrounding those. For each round that has ended, 1 more of the shells hits the target hex, starting with the shells hitting the outer hexes. The Suppressive Fire trait also applies to this ability.
This ability's Damage ignores all of the attacker bonuses and modifiers (including elevation), and cannot Crit.
(How does Basilisk Barrage work?)

passiveAbility.description: Friendly units within 2 hexes with the trait Heavy Weapon gain +X Damage.

name: Thaumachus
description: Kairatar Thaumachus, Exalted Sorcerer, is a character of the Thousand Sons faction.

activeAbility.name: Attempted Possession
activeAbility.description:
Attempted Possession
Target an enemy within 2 hexes. The target and any Summons it has summoned become possessed and immediately perform a normal attack against the closest enemy unit, preferring unpossessed targets. Possessed units deal X% of their own Damage to a maximum of Y Damage per hit. Possessed Summons will move before attacking.
(How does Attempted Possession Work?)

passiveAbility.name: Arcane Shield
passiveAbility.description:
Arcane Shield
After moving, Thaumachus applies a Shield to the closest friendly unit within 2 hexes, preferring Thousand Sons units, then other Chaos units, then other friendly units, and lastly casting it on himself if there is no other valid target. The shield has X Health and lasts one round.
If Thaumachus does not move, then this ability triggers at the end of his turn.

name: The Patermine
description: The Patermine, Genestealer Patriarch, is a character of the Genestealer Cults faction.

activeAbility.name: Might From Below
activeAbility.description:
Might From Below
Deals 5x X Psychic Damage to an adjacent enemy, then summons a Purestrain Genestealer on each Decoy adjacent to the Patermine. The Purestrain Genestealers can immediately attack in melee, but cannot move this turn.
This ability's Damage ignores all of the attacker bonuses and modifiers (including elevation), and cannot Crit.

passiveAbility.name: Cosmic Horror
passiveAbility.description:
Cosmic Horror
Whenever the Patermine defeats an enemy, it places a Decoy on the hex of that enemy. Other enemies surrounding the defeated unit have a X% chance to be Suppressed for 1 round, and have a X% chance to trigger Battle Fatigue a second time, if they have it. When the Patermine moves onto a decoy, it heals itself for Y Health.

name: Titus
description: Lieutenant Demetrian Titus is a character of the Ultramarines faction.

activeAbility.name: Tactical Precision
activeAbility.description:
Tactical Precision
Attacks a targeted adjacent enemy. If Titus has charged that enemy this turn, he deal 1x X Bolter Damage to it. This attack is always a Crit and deals an additional +Y Crit Damage.
If Titus did not charge the targeted enemy this turn, he instead deals 3x Z Chain Damage to all adjacent enemies.
When Titus gets revived or resurrected and Tactical Precision has already been used, then Tactical Precision can be use again in battle.

passiveAbility.name: Fuelled by Fury
passiveAbility.description:
Fuelled by Fury
Deals +X Damage with all attacks for each time a friendly Character has used an active ability this battle. The first time each turn that Titus is defeated he cannot be Overkilled. The first time each turn he defeats an enemy with an attack triggered by Final Vengeance he is immediately revived with Y Health.

name: Tjark
description: Tjark Wyrdslayer is a character of the Space Wolves faction.

activeAbility.name: Grapnel Launcher
activeAbility.description:
Grapnel Launcher
Targets an enemy unit within 3 Hexes and deals 1x X Physical Damage to it. If Tjark is not already adjacent to the target, it is then pulled 1 hex towards Tjark if possible, and can be pulled over any elevation but not through impassable terrain. Tjark then moves to occupy the hex the target originally occupied if it's free, or a free adjacent hex if it is not. If there are no free hexes, then Tjark does not move.

passiveAbility.name: Hunters Beyond Death
passiveAbility.description:
Hunters Beyond Death
Deals +X Damage against Psykers, and Enemy Psykers within 2 Hexes deal -X Damage.
Unless they are Immune, Enemy Psykers within 2 Hexes will not hit an additional unit with their normal ranged attacks.

name: Toth
description: Sokar Toth, Scarab Occult Terminator, is a character of the Thousand Sons faction.
traits: Suppressive Fire, Terminator Armour, Weaver of Fates

activeAbility.name: Hellfyre Missile Rack
activeAbility.description:
Hellfyre Missile Rack
Deals 1x X Heavy Round Damage to a target enemy unit within range 3 and an additional 1x X Heavy Round Damage to each enemy unit on the map that was dealt Psychic Damage this turn, which can include the initial target again.
This ability's Damage ignores all of the attacker bonuses and modifiers (including elevation), and cannot Crit.

passiveAbility.name: Time Flux
passiveAbility.description:
At the beginning of his turn, Toth regenerates X Health plus an additional amount equal to the Damage of the last hit he received in the last enemy turn. The total amount restored cannot exceed Y Health.
When Toth moves, he leaves a time ghost behind on the hex he moved from. The time ghost vanishes if the hex becomes occupied by another unit or if the terrain becomes impassable (as with Broken Ice). The first time Toth dies each battle, if his time ghost is on the battlefield then he revives with Z Health remaining at its location. This works even if Toth is Overkilled.

activeAbility.name: Plague Wind
activeAbility.description:
Plague Wind
Deals 1x X Psychic Damage to a target within 2 hexes. Any enemies adjacent to the initial target take 1x Y Psychic Damage. Any further enemies adjacent to at least one secondary target take 1x Z Psychic Damage.
This ability's Damage ignores all of the attacker bonuses and modifiers (including elevation), and cannot Crit.

passiveAbility.name: Destroyer Hive
passiveAbility.description:
Destroyer Hive
Deals 1x X Direct Damage to one random adjacent enemy at the start of his turn.

name: Tyrant Guard
description: Tyrant Guard, the Guardian Organism, is a character of the Tyranids faction.

activeAbility.name: Crushing Claws
activeAbility.description:
Crushing Claws
Deals 2x X Piercing Damage to an adjacent enemy and Taunts them for 1 round. Enemies adjacent to both the Tyrant Guard and the target are dealt 1x X Physical Damage and then get pushed back 1 Hex. All affected units become Suppressed for 1 round.

passiveAbility.name: Guardian Organism
passiveAbility.description:
Guardian Organism
If the Tyrant Guard is within Synapse range or did not move during its previous turn, it and friendly units affected by its Big Target trait take -X% Damage during the enemy's next turn, up to a maximum of -Y Damage per hit.
Note: The percent damage reduction occurs pre-Armour.

name: Tyrith
description: Tyrith Shiva Kyrus, Custodian Guard, is a character of the Adeptus Custodes faction.

activeAbility.name: Vigilance Eternal
activeAbility.description:
Vigilance Eternal
Targets an enemy unit that has a free adjacent hex within movement range 2 of Tyrith or is already on a hex adjacent to Tyrith. She then moves to the free hex and deals 3x X Power Damage to the targeted unit. This ability can be used multiple times per battle but has a cooldown of 2 rounds.
Using Vigilance Eternal does not end Tyrith's turn.

passiveAbility.name: Unwavering Sentinel
passiveAbility.description:
Unwavering Sentinel
During each enemy turn, after Tyrith is attacked and the attacker is within range 2, she deals 2x X Bolter Damage to the attacker. If there is an enemy adjacent to Tyrith, the range of this ability is reduced to 1.

description: Ulf Frosthowl is a character of the Space Wolves faction.

activeAbility.name: Great Frost Axe
activeAbility.description:
Great Frost Axe
Attack an enemy unit in melee for 4x X Piercing Damage and cover the hex the enemy stands on and all hexes adjacent to it in Ice. The Crit Damage bonus of the Ice is already applied for this attack.

passiveAbility.name: Savage Killer
passiveAbility.description:
Savage Killer
When a Summon moves to or is summoned adjacent to Ulf, he immediately deals 5x X Power Damage to it. Ulf will also perform this ability against any enemy that attempts to use an active ability while in a Hex adjacent to him, in which case he deals his Damage before that unit's ability is activated.

name: Vitruvius
description: Magos Dominus Vitruvius Thannek is a character of the Adeptus Mechanicus faction.

activeAbility.name: Rad-Bombardment
activeAbility.description:
Rad-Bombardment
Deals 1x X Toxic Damage to all units in a straight line in one of 6 directions and adds Contamination to all hexes in the line. All units hits are Suppressed. The length of the line starts at 2 hexes and increases by 1 hex for each round that has passed and by 1 hex each time a friendly Mechanic restores Health of a unit.
This ability's Damage ignores all of the attacker bonuses and modifiers (including elevation), and cannot Crit.

passiveAbility.name: Master Annihilator
passiveAbility.description:
Master Annihilator
When Vitruvius performs a Normal Attack against an enemy, that enemy is affected by Master Annihilator until Vitruvius is defeated of performs a normal attack against a different unit. Attacks by any friendly unit against the affected enemy score an additional hit, except attacks that deal Psychic Damage. This additional hit can deal a maximum of X Damage.

name: Winged Prime
description: Winged Prime, the Lead Warrior Organism, is a character of the Tyranids faction.

activeAbility.name: Alpha Warrior
activeAbility.description:
Alpha Warrior
If the Winged Prime has not moved this turn, summons a Tyranid Warrior on a free hex within Synapse range. The Tyranid Warrior cannot move this turn, but can immediately perform a normal attack against an enemy in range.
Scything Talons (Active)
Attacks an enemy in melee for 3x X Bio Damage and any enemy units adjacent to that target and to the Prime take 2x X Bio Damage. Double hits against Summons.
Reinforced Hive Node (Passive)
Every second round - starting from the first the Prime is in play - the Prime has +100% Armour and - if it has Block - 100% Block Chance.

passiveAbility.name: Synaptic Lynchpin
passiveAbility.description:
Synaptic Lynchpin
Whenever the Winged Prime, or another friendly unit with Synapse, performs a normal attack against an enemy and that enemy is not defeated, summon a Hormagaunt adjacent to the target, which immediately attacks the enemy. Cannot have more than X Hormagaunts summoned this way at the same time.
Adrenal Glands (Passive)
May move with +1 Movement if that move ends in a hex adjacent to an enemy.
Hungering Swarm (Passive)
Whenever this unit performs a melee attack, it deals +1 Hit for any friendly Hormagaunt or Ripper Swarm adjacent to the target.

name: Xybia
description: Xybia Kheiser, Magus, is a character of the Genestealer Cults faction.

activeAbility.name: Mind Control
activeAbility.description:
Mind Control
Targets an enemy unit within 3 hexes that is adjacent to one or more friendly units. For this round and the next, that enemy unit deals -X Damage, takes +Y% Damage, and becomes Taunted by the adjacent unit with the highest current Health.
Note: The adjacent unit with the highest current Health is chosen from among the friendly units. Healing or Repairing remove the bonus damage effect.

passiveAbility.name: Decoy
passiveAbility.description: After moving, places a Decoy on an empty adjacent hex. Then, if there are 2 or more decoys adjacent to Xybia, summons a Neophyte Hybrid on one adjacent decoy. If Xybia does not move, then this ability triggers at the end of her turn.

name: Yazaghor
description: Yazaghor Ficklefate, Tzaangor Enlightened, is a character of the Thousand Sons faction.

activeAbility.name: Sorcerous Facade
activeAbility.description:
Sorcerous Facade
Target a friendly Psyker. Until the beginning of Yazaghor's next turn both he and the target deal an additional 1x X Psychic Damage with their normal attacks.
Yazaghor performs a normal attack against the closest enemy unit, and then switches positions with the targeted Psyker.
Note: this ability can only be used if Yazaghor has an enemy in range.

passiveAbility.name: Reality Unbound
passiveAbility.description:
Reality Unbound
For each different enemy unit that was dealt Psychic Damage this turn Yazaghor deals +X Maximum Damage with his normal ranged attacks. If three or more different enemy units have been dealt Psychic Damage this turn he gains +1 Movement and his normal ranged attack gets +1 Range until the end of this turn.
Note: Bonus Maximum Damage extends the high end of the 20% variance range. See this How Does That Work article for more information.
